HotelElement.Name: Holiday Inn & Suites Edmonton Airport & Conf Ctr

Description.Text: Facilities Guests are welcomed at the hotel, which has a total of 97 rooms. The accommodation offers various services and facilities, including a restaurant, a dining area and a business centre, for a comfortable and relaxing stay. Wireless internet access in public areas allows travellers to stay connected. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the establishment. Rooms The hotel features rooms with air conditioning. Facilities include a fridge, a tea/coffee station and WiFi. The accommodation offers non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. The hotel features numerous leisure facilities, including a pool and an indoor pool. The accommodation offers a gym (for a fee) to guests.
